hotspot.description: <h4 style='text-align:left;'>The fully automated Cobas 8100 system contributes to optimal solutions for the capacity and reliability of test results. The system is connected to 2 Cobas 8,000 machines including 4 E602 modules for immune analysis with a processing capacity of up to 720 samples per hour, 1 C702 module and 1 C502 module for biochemical analysis with a processing capacity of 2,800 samples per hour.
hotspot.title: Cobas 8100

hotspot.description: <h4 style='text-align:left;'>The fully automated Cobas 8100 system contributes to optimal solutions for the capacity and reliability of test results. The system is connected to 2 Cobas 8,000 machines including 4 E602 modules for immune analysis with a processing capacity of up to 720 samples per hour, 1 C702 module and 1 C502 module for biochemical analysis with a processing capacity of 2,800 samples per hour.

hotspot.description: <h4 style='text-align:left;'>Cobas e801 is the latest line of Roche immunoassay machines based on the principle of Electrochemiluminescence ECL. Cobas e801 has a capacity of up to 300 immunoassays per hour, can load reagents continuously, up to 5 reagent boxes at a time
hotspot.title: Cobas e801

hotspot.description: <h4 style='text-align:left;'>Cobas c702 is produced by Roche of Switzerland. The machine has testing specifications including 70 test channels and a capacity of 2000 tests/hour. The machine has 2 sample suction needles and 4 test drug suction needles with a sample probe that has technology to detect blood clots and liquid levels. Ultrasonic wave mixing technology. The machine reading and manages test drugs by barcode.
hotspot.title: Cobas c702

hotspot.description: <h4 style='text-align:left;'>Automated biochemistry Cobas c702. Capacity: 2000 tests/hour. Manufacturer: Roche-Switzerland
hotspot.title: Cobas c702

hotspot.description: <h4 style='text-align:left;'>The fully automated Cobas 8100 system contributes to optimal solutions for the capacity and reliability of test results.The system is connected to 2 Cobas 8,000 machines including 4 E602 modules for immune analysis with a processing capacity of up to 720 samples per hour, 1 C702 module and 1 C502 module for biochemical analysis with a processing capacity of 2,800 samples per hour

hotspot.description: <h4 style='text-align:left;'>Auto Immunity Cobas e801. Capacity: 300 tests/hour. Manufacturer: Roche-Switzerland. The Cobas e801 can continuously load reagents, up to 5 reagent boxes at a time.
hotspot.title: Cobas e801

hotspot.description: <h4 style='text-align:left;'>Fully automated pre-analysis system Accelerator A3600. The testing capacity of the system can reach up to 1000 immunoassay tests/hour and 4400 biochemical tests/hour. The system consists of 2 biochemical modules and 5 immunoassay modules. Services provided include a wide range of tests in the fields of biochemistry, immunology, and endocrinology to serve clinical needs.Biochemistry: 60 services. Immunology-Endocrinology: 80 services.
hotspot.title: Accelerator A3600

hotspot.description: <h4 style='text-align:left;'>The automated Cobas 6800 Molecular Biology system can do multiple test types at once such as SARS-COV-2 Realtime PCR, HBV, HCV, and other tests for HPV viruses ... but still gives accurate results.The system has a capacity of responding to 380 samples per 8 hours. Manufacturer: Roche - Switzerland.
hotspot.title: Cobas 6800

hotspot.description: <h4 style='text-align:left;'>The Automated Molecular Biology System Alinity M is a fully integrated automated molecular diagnostic analyzer that uses real-time PCR technology to offers flexibility and efficiency. Machine capacity: 384 samples /8 hours, Manufacturer: Abbott-America
hotspot.title: Alinity M
